application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: H1 Leyland Cypress on rear left hand boundary - Reduce the overall height by approximately 1m, to the same height as the guttering, and trim the hedge face, garden side into a more even face. Include cutting back the Holly that is growing across the lawn.G1 Group of Yew, Hawthorn & Fir making up a mixed hedge situated on the rear boundary - Reduce the Fir to the same height as the neighbouring Yew and shape the remaining canopy. Lift the lower level to expose border and shape the Hawthorns into a more rounded shape.T1 Spruce on rear boundary - Remove 1 lower lateral.T2 Maple on rear right hand boundary - Reduce the overall canopy by up to 1m, shape accordingly and remove major deadwood and sucker/basal growth.H2 Cypress on rear right hand boundary - Section fell as close to ground level as possible.T3 Dead Apple situated on the rear right hand boundary - Section fell as close to ground level as possible.T4 Neighbouring Willow on rear right hand boundary - Reduce a selection of laterals overhanging client's garden back to boundary, cutting to appropriate growth points where possible.
